text: Pier 23 is a 1951 American film noir movie. It was directed by William Berke for Lippert Pictures.PIER 23 (Lippert-Exclusive) Picture Show; London Vol. 58, Iss. 1506, (Feb 9, 1952): 10. It was intended for television as well as the cinema.PIER 23 Monthly Film Bulletin; London Vol. 18, Iss. 204, (Jan 1, 1951): 377. ==Cast== ==See also== *Danger Zone (1951) *Roaring City (1951) ==References== ==External links== * *Pier 23 at TCMDB *Pier 23 at BFI Category:1951 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American crime films Category:1951 crime films Category:Lippert Pictures films Category:Films directed by William A. Berke
title: Pier 23
